text:
NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
NAEB TAPE NETWORK
UNIVERSITY OF ILLINOIS
119 GREGORY HALL
URBANA, ILLINOIS
April 27, 1954
The enclosed copies of letters between Mr. Glenn Starlin
of Station KWAX, University of Oregon, and myself are, I believe,
self-explanatory. Will you please send your comments to your
committee chairman, Mr. Frank Schooley, Director of Broadcasting,
University of Illinois.
Thank you.
Sincerely,
d.U ^
JRH:mr
John R. Holt
Network Manager
